Centering

Horizontal centering is usually pretty straightforward. Vertical centering, on the other hand, can be surprisingly difficult. If you don't need to support older browsers flexbox can make quick work of horizontal and vertical centering.

.flex-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

There is also a hacky way to accomplish this

.item-to-center {
  position: absolute;
  padding-top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
}
